file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 55-21-00-04 - ELEVATOR MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ELEVATOR MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the elevator mass adjustment plate. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ELEVATOR MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATE - ALL 55-21-00-000-801-A REMOVAL ELEVATOR MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATE - ALL 55-21-00-400-801-A INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 55-21-00 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 55-21-00-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ELEVATOR MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the elevator mass adjustment plate. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 55-20-01-000-801-A/400 ELEVATOR TIPS - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 335 Elevator LH 336 Elevator RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Elevator I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the elevator tips ( AMM TASK 55-20-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the four bolts (2). (2) Remove the steel plate (3). (3) Remove the mass adjustment plate (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 55-21-00 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Elevator Mass Adjustment Plate - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 335 336 B DET. A 2 2. BOLT (4) 3. STEEL PLATE 1 1 1. MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATE DET. B 1 APPLY INTERFACE SEALANT: MIL-PRF-81733 TYPE IV-12 2 WET THE BOLTS WITH MIL-PRF-81733 TYPE IV-12 EM145AMM550020B.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 55-21-00 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 55-21-00-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. ELEVATOR MASS ADJUSTMENT PLATE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the elevator mass adjustment plate. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 55-20-01-400-801-A/400 ELEVATOR TIPS - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 335 Elevator LH 336 Elevator RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Elevator I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the mass adjustment plate (1), steel plate (3) and apply one coat of interface sealant P/S870C-12 (MIL-PRF-81733, type IV, class 12) to all part interfaces. (2) Soak the four bolts (2) in P/S870C-12 and install them. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the elevator tips ( AMM TASK 55-20-01-400-801-A/400).
